"Chicken, buck ba buck. You've got no gear box girly bot. Face me like a 
machine fatso," the voice taunts Motormaster.


>From: gestalt_menasor@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

>
>Motormaster's eyes narrow, and he turns around and walks back to the
>hill. "Forget it," he spits, disgusted that whatever it is lacks the
>gearbox to show itself.
>
